file_content.text: Sooner we're off this planet, the better.
Rules or no rules, Tarro Blood dies the next time we see him! Right?
That scum is living on borrowed time.
I promise, Mako.
Ugh. I hate this. I don't want to feel this way about anyone, but I just... I want to make him pay!
Sometimes it's right to hate.
Trust your anger.
Yeah? I'd be happy going my whole life never knowing when those times were.
Don't worry, Mako. It's going to be alright.
I sympathize.
Don't get all mushy on me. I was just saying, is all.
We'd better get moving. We've got a Great Hunt to win, right?
Attagirl--get pumped!
So let's do it!
Ha! All right, let's get moving. We've got a Tarro Blood to kill and a Great Hunt to win!
Calm down. Tarro's trying to make us angry.
Cool off.
Some of us were already angry!
If killing Tarro means I don't win the Great Hunt, he lives. Got it?
I'm following the rules.
How can you say that after everything he's done?
That man killed Braden--my father! Have you already forgotten that?
Braden wasn't your real father, now was he?
Your father? Come on!
What does this have to do with anything? You're not even listening.
This conversation is over. Let's get off this lousy planet.
Business comes first, sweet cheeks.
It's not personal, kid.
Business comes first, little girl.
It's not personal, kid.
An absolute mercenary. I'm not here for your glory, you know.
You need to have patience.
No--so calm down.
Yeah, I guess. Big as this galaxy is, we'll run into Tarro sooner or later....
We should get out of here. The Great Hunt's already started.
Let's keep going, yeah?
Come on--the Mandalorian enclave is in the Citadel. Our contact is someone named Crysta Markon.
Ugh. Spaceports all smell the same. Engine exhaust, coolant fluid and spacers who haven't bathed in a week.
Let's get out of this stink. Whatever the rest of Dromund Kaas is like, the air's gotta be fresher than in here.
I would've figured you'd been to Dromund Kaas before.
First time here?
Braden and I moved around a lot when we first got together, but we never made it here.
It still smells better than Hutta.
Could be worse.
That's like saying a girl's "slimmer than a Hutt."
We'll leave when I say we leave, got it?
Stop being so pushy.
Aw, come on, grumpy. I'm just excited to be in the Great Hunt.
Keep in mind, Imperials aren't fond of aliens. Step out of line, and they'll notice.
Just a reminder, this is an Imperial world--which means rules, rules and more rules.
If we tweak the local authorities, they could make life really hard.
My goal is to join the Great Hunt--that's it.
I'm only here to compete.
Still, let's try to keep a low profile.
I like tweaking with authority.
Sounds like fun.
Anyone crosses me, dies.
And then they'll be dead.
How'd I know you were gonna say that?
What do you want?
